page.title: 05THORNESS FARM.
page.content: Thorness Farm is a mixed farm.It has pigs,beef and dairy cattle.It produces all its own animal feed in a good year hay, grass and silage.It is 130 acres.There are 66 dairy cows and 24 beef cattle.The Fiesian herd gives about 200 gallons of milk a day.There are more than 30 sows and 3 boars.Some of the sows had piglets,about 13 each. They are kept in narrow pens so that they don't squash the piglets.When the sows are old they are fattened for sausages.Mr Attrill has lived at his farm for 50 years and he has been farming ever since he was old enough.
